snippet: Brian Brecht, accused of verbal abuse, returned to the men’s team after the university found no criminal or university violations.
abstract: Rutgers reinstates its men’s lacrosse coach Brian Brecht, after suspending him with pay as it investigated allegations of verbal abuse.
lead_paragraph: Brian Brecht, accused of verbal abuse, returned to the men’s team after the university found no criminal or university violations.

headline.seo: Rutgers Reinstates Lacrosse Coach After Inquiry
headline.main: Rutgers Reinstates Lacrosse Coach After Inquiry

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
